title: Welcome to ICP5006 Blog of Farley Rimon
description: Welcome to our new blog, ICP5006 Blog of Farley Rimon. Here you can keep track of the progress made during the course. I will document my     opinion on findings about projects related to urban data analysis.

title: Week 1
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
So far, struggling a little
bit
Things tend to go slow for several reasons:

I just want to get started with the projects!

Program interface (to zoom or not to zoom?)
Disbalance in student expertise
I just want to get started with the projects!Or the hardcore
(new) theory. I believe reviewing old material is to be done in
someone’s own time. Well, that’s how my uni went so I am used to the
stress hahaha. It is also just part of my natural character. Because of
this, I am excited for what is to come…
Finished taller de R
Experience: + Not very different to Python + Need to get used to the
syntax + Actually pretty easy to use. The interface is insanely simple +
I am scared some solutions I will not know because of a lack of
dominance of R. Hopefully we can help each other with
this.
